articles.description: WASHINGTON, Feb 2: A compound found in the medicinal and culinary herb rosemary may potentially block the SARS-CoV-2 virus, and prevent inflammation caused by COVID-19, a preliminary study suggests. The research, published in the journal Antioxidants, found t…
